title: Dregs Island
description: Seventeen-year-old Alex Cardin witnesses a hit and run and is falsely convicted of vehicular homicide. It is six years after President Gray's Prison Reform Act of 2026. Prisons have been shut down across the United States, and all felons must serve life sentences on isolated prison islands where escape is impossible, and rules of civility are obsolete. Alex is sent to Dregs Island and has no choice but to rely on his sharp intuition as well as his new allies when he's pitted against Tobias - the ruthless ruler of the island who was a legendary serial killer back on the mainland. Alex is forced to make decisions along the way that weigh survival against humankind and family against friendship.
author: Bon Blossman
